scripts.compile-module: rimraf build/module && cpy src build/module && replace %%VERSION%% $npm_package_version build/module/picogl.js
scripts.compile-types: jsdoc -t node_modules/tsd-jsdoc/dist -r -d build ./src/*.js && replace-in-file /declare/g export build/types.d.ts --isRegex
scripts.compile: npm run compile-module && npm run compile-bundle && compile-types
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage/ && npm run lint && glcheck && nyc report --reporter=lcov
